articles.title: Forget Transistors: This New “Intelligent” Material Computes Like a Human Brain - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Tiny molecules that can think, remember, and learn may be the missing link between electronics and the brain. For more than half a century, researchers have looked for ways to move past silicon by building electronics from molecules. The idea sounded simple a…
articles.content: Researchers have created molecular devices that can change their electronic role on the fly, behaving like memory, logic, or even artificial synapses. By designing adaptable chemistry at the molecula… [+4976 chars]
